callbackUrl.description: Optional callback URL. By default, the first callback URL in the OAuth JSON file is used.

url.description: The URL that SSO Proxy will redirect the user to

secret.description: A secret used to sign the JWT token

query.description:
Configures what information is passed in the URL's query parameters. The following placeholder variables are available:
{jwt}: Will be replaced with the JWT
{state} Will be replaced with the state generated by the app
{oauth.*}: Will be replaced by data from Google.

jwt.description: Configures the data that will be put in the JWT. All query placeholder variables (with the exception of `jwt`) can be used here.

default.description: Specifies the default data for the JWT.

overrides.description: Allows for overriding JWT properties based on the value of other JWT properties.
